PATCH /accounts/{identifier}/gateway/con.description: Patches the current Zero Trust account configuration. This endpoint can update a single subcollection of settings such as `antivirus`, `tls_decrypt`, `activity_log`, `block_page`, `browser_isolation`, `fips`, `body_scanning`, or `custom_certificate`, without updating the entire configuration object. Returns an error if any collection of settings is not properly configured.
